data_table.description: Clinic Exam Data: Interview, Physical Exam, ECG, Original Exam 30. Surviving original cohort participants were invited to participate in the 30h follow-up examination. Participants who declined a research clinic visit were offered a visit in their personal residence or nursing home. The examination included a physician-administered medical history interview (or for examinations that occurred outside the research clinic, a technician-administered interview), technician-administered questionnaires to assess cognitive and physical function, and clinical measurements (anthropometrics, ECG and physical performance measures).

variable.name: fw455
variable.description: KATZ: Activities of Daily Living - During the Course of a Normal Day, can you do the following activities independently or need help from another person or use special equipment or a device? - Dressing
variable.comment: Dressing (undressing and redressing) Devices such as: velcro, elastic laces.
variable.value: Do not do during a normal day

variable.name: fw456
variable.description: KATZ: Activities of Daily Living - During the Course of a Normal Day, can you do the following activities independently or need help from another person or use special equipment or a device? - Bathing
variable.comment: Bathing (including getting in and out of tub or shower) Devices such as: bath chair, long handled sponge, hand held shower, safety bars.
variable.value: Do not do during a normal day

variable.name: fw457
variable.description: KATZ: Activities of Daily Living - During the Course of a Normal Day, can you do the following activities independently or need help from another person or use special equipment or a device? - Eating
variable.comment: Devices such as: rocking knife, spork, long straw, plate guard.
variable.value: Do not do during a normal day

variable.name: fw458
variable.description: KATZ: Activities of Daily Living - During the Course of a Normal Day, can you do the following activities independently or need help from another person or use special equipment or a device? - Transferring
variable.comment: Transferring (getting in and out of a chair) Devices such as: sliding board, grab bars, special seat.
variable.value: Do not do during a normal day

variable.name: fw459

variable.value: Do not do during a normal day
